title: The original chart instance in report design handle is not modified after running the report
OB: The original chart instance in the report design handle is not modified after running the report. In my application, I get the design time instance of the chart and then call a method to run the report. However, the chart is not bound with data after running the report. This was working fine until BIRT 2.0M3, but it is not working as expected in BIRT RC and 2.0 version.
EB: The original chart instance in the report design handle should be modified after running the report. In my application, I expect to get a chart bound with data after running the report, just like it was working fine in BIRT 2.0M3.
